org.jamesframework.core.factory

Interface LocalSearchFactory<SolutionType extends Solution>

  • Type Parameters:
    SolutionType - solution type of created local searches, required to extend Solution
    All Superinterfaces:
    SearchFactory<SolutionType>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface LocalSearchFactory<SolutionType extends Solution>
extends SearchFactory<SolutionType>
    Factory used to create a local search given the problem to be solved.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalSearch<SolutionType> create(Problem<SolutionType> problem)
      Create a local search, given the problem to solve.

    • Method Detail

      • create
